title: [Ruins, Stone Structure]
description: Seaweed placed atop carefully spaced columns creates a roof over a small, three-walled, stone structure perched on one edge of the platform.  Within the structure, a series of beds stacks one on top of the other along the sides, leaving ample room for activities in the center.

Seaweed placed atop carefully spaced columns creates a roof over a small, stone structure.  Within the structure, a series of beds stack one on top of another along the sides, leaving ample room for activities at the center.
